DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the influence of mammographic breast density at diagnosis on the risk of cancer recurrence and survival outcome in patients with invasive breast cancer after surgery
DOC.brief_title: Mammographic Density and the Risk of Tumor Recurrence in Asian Women: a Case-control Study
DOC.criteria: Women diagnosed with invasive breast cancer between 2004 and 2009 who had undergone surgery and had the mammographic breast density ascertained before, or at, diagnosis. Women diagnosed with invasive breast cancer between 2004 and 2009 who had not undergone surgery or who had no mammographic breast density ascertained before, or at, diagnosis.
